issue.title: [CF 765] Add a condition: Energy: Time until cap
issue.body:
With verious haste procs and bloodlust and abilities like the monk's energizing brew it would be great if there was a condition you could select that was:

if Energy: Time until capped <,>,=,~=  ###.### seconds.

This would be useful in selecting which abilities to show without having to program all kinds of conditions into the addon.

(PS Thanks and keep up the amazing work!)


> Posted by CurseForge user pjkhan | Imported from CurseForge issue #765 | Raw

comments.body:
This isn't something that I would be wanting to add as a normal condition in TMW. You can always accomplish it using a Lua condition with the following code:

``` ((UnitPowerMax("player") - UnitPower("player")) / GetPowerRegen()) > 5 ```

Replace the operator and the number at the end with the desired operator and the desired number of seconds until energy cap.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks cyber! I'll give that a try.


> Posted by CurseForge user pjkhan
